wikipedia_page.main: Gerald Denys Marchand (24 April 1921 – 26 March 2005) was a British sprint canoer who competed in the early 1950s. At the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki, he finished ninth in the C-1 10000 m event while being eliminated in the heats of the C-1 1000 m event.

response: * Gerald Marchand (1921–2005), British olympian in canoeing
